alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 1:47AM CST until February 09 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, Jackson and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday night and crest at 23.0 feet on Monday morning. The river will slowly fall to below flood stage by Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
